front.title: •I Am Your Father (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. [Death Star 2] Vader is deploy = 6. Once per turn, may deploy Vader's Lightsaber from Reserve Deck; reshuffle (or lose 1 Force to deploy from Lost Pile). Whenever a lightsaber swung by Vader 'hits' a character, opponent loses 1 Force. Immune to NOOOOOOOOOOOO!. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Search your feelings, you know it to be true.'
